definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: The decay reaches into the dentin, where it can spread and undermine the enamel.
sentences.chinese: 當齲壞擴散破壞到釉質下方，就進入了牙本質。

sentences.english: Conclusion It is effective that fluoride iontophoresis treats dentin hypersensitivity.
sentences.chinese: 結論氟離子導入法治療牙本質過敏症是有效的。

sentences.english: Objective To know the mechanisms of treating dentine hypersensitivity by NS Paint.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討NS牙面塗料對牙本質過敏症的治療機制。

sentences.english: Blot the canal dry with a large paper point, leaving the dentin visibly moist.
sentences.chinese: 使用粗紙尖吸乾根管水分，牙本質保留明顯的溼潤。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of a new desensitizer on the treatment of dentinal hypersensitivity.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究新型牙本質脫敏劑極固寧的作用機制。

sentences.english: Conclusion Fluoride iontophoresis can effectively occlude the dentine tubules.
sentences.chinese: 結論氟離子導入對於牙本質小管有一定封閉作用。

sentences.english: PAX9 is involved in the biomineralization process of the dentine and enamel.
sentences.chinese: PAX9參與牙本質和釉質的生物礦化過程。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of nano-hydroxyapatite on the remineralization of decalcified dentin.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究納米羥基磷灰石對軟化牙本質再礦化的效果。
